title: A City Sparrow
cast_members: Ethel Clayton|Walter Hiers|Clyde Fillmore|Lillian Leighton|William Boyd|Rose Cade|Robert Brower|Helen Jerome Eddy|Sylvia Ashton

media.title: A City Sparrow (1920) - Poster

media.title: A City Sparrow (1920) - 3.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American silent film A City Sparrow (1920), page 31 of the January 1921 Film Fun. In the film Milly West (Ethel Clayton), a cabaret dancer becomes injured, and after a surgeon says she cannot become a mother, she gives up on love. Tim (Walter Hiers) loves her and after she rejects him, writes his mother in the country that he has killed himself. David (Clyde Fillmore), a man from the country takes her there to recover and later wins her over. Still 3: "Too weak to continue her dan
